com.master.keymanagementserver.kms.helpers

Class AuthnRequestHelper

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.master.keymanagementserver.kms.helpers.AuthnRequestHelper

  • @Component
public class AuthnRequestHelper
extends java.lang.Object
    provides functions to create the AuthnRequest which needs to be send to the IdP

      • getStringWriter

        private static java.io.StringWriter getStringWriter(org.opensaml.saml.saml2.core.AuthnRequest authnRequest)
                                             throws org.opensaml.core.xml.io.MarshallingException,
                                                    javax.xml.transform.TransformerException,
                                                    java.lang.InstantiationException
        Create a StringWriter out of the provided AuthnRequest the AuthnRequest will be marshalled then an DOMSource will be created and after all it will be transformed to a StringWriter
        Parameters:
        authnRequest - the authnRequest that should be marshalled an transformed
        Returns:
        the transformed authnRequest
        Throws:
        org.opensaml.core.xml.io.MarshallingException - throw exception if authnRequest can not be marshalled
        javax.xml.transform.TransformerException - throw exception if Transformer can not be instantiated or domSource can not be transormed
        java.lang.InstantiationException - thrown if Marshaller, TransformerFactory or Transformer is null

      • getRedirectURL

        public java.lang.String getRedirectURL()
        load the URL of the IdP builds the AuthnRequest encodes the AuthnRequest brings the idpURL, the encoded AuthnRequest and the RelayState together and returns it
        Returns:
        the url to which should be redirected

      • encodeAuthnRequest

        private java.lang.String encodeAuthnRequest(org.opensaml.saml.saml2.core.AuthnRequest authnRequest)
                                     throws org.opensaml.core.xml.io.MarshallingException,
                                            javax.xml.transform.TransformerException,
                                            java.io.IOException,
                                            java.lang.InstantiationException
        encodes the provided authnRequest transform the authnRequest to a string and encode this in redirectForm
        Parameters:
        authnRequest - authnRequest that needs to be encoded
        Returns:
        the encoded string
        Throws:
